CHAT.comment: MOT is involved in the play at some points but is frequently distracted by her cat and by conversation with the EXP. She occasionally directs activities and does make some attempt to engage in science talk with Chi about the pull of the magnets. The cat is present during most of the activity and causes disruption in the flow of play

u.a: continues to talk about the magnets and where to put them

reaches over and begins to pull magnets off the black base

CHAT.comment: Time is 33:23. MOT and EXP talk about the cat's recent operation and recovery for several lines
